Integration of GitHub repositories in Zenodo
Introduction
2
Zenodo
o Open-access
repository
developed
under
the
European OpenAIRE program and operated by CERN.
o Enables researchers from all disciplines to share and
preserve their research outputs, regardless of size or format
GitHub
o website and cloud-based service that helps developers store
